name: Chicken'd Out
description:
Play as an old farmer with a Malfunctioning Flame Thrower who is out to roast some chickens and get them home to his loving wife. 

Flamethrower has gone out of control! No time to fix it, or your wife will eat you alive! Flamethrower is one of the most unreliable and powerful weapon you got!  

W,A,S,D to move and you're good to go!

Hop from tile to tile as you chase those chickens down. But beware of their egg projectiles and peck attacks! Can you get all the roast chicken you need before time runs out?
